              Metal Gear Solid V Phantom Pain including a working crack!
                 There are a lot of non-working copies of this game
                       but I assure you that this one works!


Instructions
--------

- Install the via via "Setup.exe"

- After installing the game, Extract and Copy the contents of the "Crack" directory to where you installed the game.
  You may get a false positive virus scan, but thats nothing new for cracks.

- Run "mgsvtpp.exe" to play game


Notes
--------

- YOU WILL GET THAT "Please wait for crack message" but after clicking the game, give it 5-10 seconds and it WILL LOAD

- If the game loads, but you are stuck on a white screen... Change your timezone to "(UTC+08:00) Beijing, Chongqing, Hong Kong, Urumqui." Not sure how or why changing the time zone fixes the issue, but it does.
